title: Technology, globalization since Second World War

content.question:
Answer all parts of the questions that follow.

Identify ONE technology that has contributed to globalization since the end of the Second World War and explain how it contributed to globalization.

Identify a SECOND technology that has contributed to globalization since the end of the Second World War and explain how it contributed to globalization.

Identify a THIRD technology that has contributed to globalization since the end of the Second World War and explain how it contributed to globalization.

frqParts.text:

Identify a THIRD technology that has contributed to globalization since the end of the Second World War and explain how it contributed to globalization.

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
